cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T.5930
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 10th October 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
Our line is reported to run FRESNOY-LE-GRAND, BOHAIN, BUSIGNY, HONNECHY, REUMONT, TROISVILLES (all inclusive), south of CAUDRY and FONTAINE-AU-PIRE, west of BEAUVOIS, west of CARNIERES, west of CAGNONCLES, west of NAVES, THUN-LEVEQUE, PAILLENCOURT (both inclusive), FRESSIES (exclusive).
Our cavalry are reported to have reached NEUVILLY (north-west of LE CATEAU).
We have taken SALLAUMINES and NOYELLES (east of LENS).
French Front.
In the ARGONNE the French have taken VAUX-LES-MOURON, MONTCHEUTIN, GRAND HAM and LANCON.
2. ITALIAN, BALKAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
Issued at 12.35 p.m.
10th October 1918.
